name: text
title: Text
description: General-purpose type for expressing textual data (a mixture of letters, numbers and symbols).

name: integer
title: Integer
description: General-purpose type for expressing an integer value.

name: dateTime
title: Number
description: General-purpose type for expressing a date and time.

name: dateOfBirth
title: Date of birth
description: The date (no time portion) for expressing the date a person was born.

name: name
title: Person's name
description: A data-type for expressing a person's name.

name: appointmentTime
title: Appointment time
description: A date and time, often originally defined for a point in the future, to express when a particular event should occur.

name: eventTime
title: Event time
description: A date and time relating to when a particular event occurred.

name: time
title: Time
description: General-purpose type for expressing a time of day (without being related to any particular date).

name: date
title: Date
description: General-purpose type for expressing a particular date (without a time component).

name: email
title: Email
description: Used to convey an email address.

name: ipv4
title: IPv4
description: Used to convey an IPv4 address.

name: ipv6
title: IPv6
description: Used to convey an IPv6 address.

name: hostname
title: Hostname
description: Used to convey an internet host name (RFC 5322).

name: idnHostname
title: IDN Hostname
description: Used to convey an internationalized host name (RFC 5890).

name: uprn
title: UPRN
description: Unique Property Reference Number as issued by Ordnance Survey as part of their gazetteer products.

name: uri
title: URI
description: A universal resource identifier (URI) according to RFC3986.

name: frsCallsign
title: Callsign
description: A unique code to identify a vehicle, officer or other asset.

name: latLong
title: Latitude/Longitude
description: A pair of numbers denoting a point on the Earth's surface.

name: fsecCode
title: FSEC code
description: A code to help categorise a premise.
